original_title: All About John Deere for Kids, Part 3
overview: More exciting John Deere action - Both new and vintage John Deere tractors. We visit Plow Day where 15 Johnny Poppers are plowing with everything up to a six - bottom plow pulled by powerful 820. We travel to the Northwest to see Feller Bunchers, Skidders, Knuckleboom Loaders, and Log Harvesters in action. Then we go to a log mill and see trees become lumber.
title: All About John Deere for Kids, Part 3
